G

getHeight() - Method in class engine.Actor
Returns The height of the current image of this actor.
getIntersectingObjects(Class<A>) - Method in class engine.Actor
Returns a list of the actors of a given type intersecting this actor.
getObjects(Class<A>) - Method in class engine.World
Returns a list of all the actors in the world of the given class.
getObjectsAt(double, double, Class<A>) - Method in class engine.World
Returns a list of all actors of the given class containing the given x, y
getOneIntersectingObject(Class<A>) - Method in class engine.Actor
Returns one actor of the given class that is intersecting this actor.
getWidth() - Method in class engine.Actor
Returns The width of the current image of this actor.
getWorld() - Method in class engine.Actor
returns the world this actor is in, or null if it is not in a world.
